author: lowette
body:
#### PR description:

This PR includes the code necessary to simulate SIMPs, implementing them as heavy neutrons with a configurable mass and as only interaction a clone of Geant's neutron's inelastic process.
This is very specific code for signal generation of the EXO-17-010 analysis. More information can be found in this presentation: https://indico.cern.ch/event/792362/contributions/3299414/attachments/1791002/2917852/190205_Lowette_SIMPSimulation.pdf

#### PR validation:

This code has been validated, among other things, by showing this SIMP simulation at 1GeV to give identical results to a simulation with a real Geant neutron replacing the SIMP. More information also in the talk mentioned above.

Note that this code has so far only been used to simulate a signal in 7_1_X, thus the initial PR  in this branch. Next, it will be forward-ported to 10_6_X.
title: Simps to customphysics 7 1
